  • Constructor Details

    • Zombie

      public Zombie(List<Zombie> zombies, List<GameElement> allElements, Board board, int roundsToNextMove)
      Constructs a Zombie element and gets a list of all instantiated elements and the board.

      Adds created item to allElements and zombies.

      Sets roundToNextMove.

      Parameters:
      allElements - list of all elements in the game.
      board - instance of the created board.
      zombies - list of all zombies.
      roundsToNextMove - rounds to next move of the zombie.

    • Zombie

      public Zombie(List<Zombie> zombies, List<GameElement> allElements, Board board, int roundsToNextMove, ZombieTypes type)
      Constructs a Zombie element and gets a list of all instantiated elements and the board.

      Adds created item to allElements and zombies.

      Sets roundToNextMove and gets the zombie type as input.

      Parameters:
      allElements - list of all elements in the game.
      board - instance of the created board.
      zombies - list of all zombies.
      roundsToNextMove - rounds to next move of the zombie.
      type - type of zombie.

      Parameters:
      survivor - instance of the survivor.
      Returns:
      the amount of fields to reach the survivor.

    • distanceToSurvivor

      public int distanceToSurvivor(Survivor survivor, String direction)
      distanceToSurvivor() calculates the distance to the survivor depending on the direction (x or y).
      Parameters:
      survivor - object of the survivor.
      direction - x: calculates distance in x-direction, y: calculates distance in y-direction.
      Returns:
      an integer represented with the amount of turns needed to reach the survivor.

    • isValidMove

      private boolean isValidMove(int x, int y, List<GameElement> fixedObjects)
      Method checks if the zombie could move to the location of a fixedObject
      Parameters:
      x - x-location of the wanted move.
      y - y-location of the wanted move.
      fixedObjects - list of all fixed objects.
      Returns:
      true if positions are not the same

    • move

      public void move(List<Survivor> survivors, List<GameElement> fixedObjects) throws Exception
      This method moves the zombie.

      It also checks the type of the zombie and adjusts the movement pattern.

      Parameters:
      survivors - list of all survivors.
      fixedObjects - list of all fixed objects.
      Throws:
      Exception - message if something went wrong.
